name: Bleeding Blocks (itch)
description:
Bleeding Blocks is a 2D arena shooter. Two players face off in a single-screen deathmatch. But winning requires more than quick reflexes - players must use cover and tactics to outsmart the enemy.

Choose from six unique classes. Will you rush in as the Rogue? Snipe from afar as the Reaper? Or deploy turrets as the Engineer? Play against a deviously smart AI or head to head in local multiplayer mode.

Features
  • 6 different classes
  • Bullet-hell shooting combined with tactical gameplay
  • A clever AI - all the screenshots to the right are player vs AI!
  • Single and local multiplayer modes
  • Catchy Synthwave music
  • Relieve stress for 5 mins by shooting stuff
